segment.source: Learn how to handle errors that are generated by the AdControl class in the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Learn how to handle errors that are generated by the AdControl class in the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: Error handling with the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Error handling with the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Error handling with the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Error handling with the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This topic provides basic information about how to handle errors that are generated by the AdControl class in the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: This topic provides basic information about how to handle errors that are generated by the AdControl class in the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: JavaScript/HTML apps
segment.target: JavaScript/HTML apps

segment.source: To handle AdControl errors in a JavaScript app:
segment.target: To handle AdControl errors in a JavaScript app:

segment.source: Assign the onErrorOccurred event to an event handler.
segment.target: Assign the onErrorOccurred event to an event handler.

segment.source: Code the event handler.
segment.target: Code the event handler.

segment.source: The onErrorOccurred event handler is set in the data-win-options attribute for the div of the AdControl.
segment.target: The onErrorOccurred event handler is set in the data-win-options attribute for the div of the AdControl.

segment.source: In the following example, the onErrorOccurred event is set to be handled by a function named errorLogger.
segment.target: In the following example, the onErrorOccurred event is set to be handled by a function named errorLogger.

segment.source: The error handling function is declarative and must be enclosed in the markSupportedForProcessing function.
segment.target: The error handling function is declarative and must be enclosed in the markSupportedForProcessing function.

segment.source: The error handler catches the JavaScript error object when an AdControl error occurs.
segment.target: The error handler catches the JavaScript error object when an AdControl error occurs.

segment.source: The error object provides two arguments to the error handler.
segment.target: The error object provides two arguments to the error handler.

segment.source: For more information, see Special Error Properties from Asynchronous Windows Runtime Methods.
segment.target: For more information, see Special Error Properties from Asynchronous Windows Runtime Methods.

segment.source: Here is an example of an error handling function named errorLogger that handles the onErrorOccurred event.
segment.target: Here is an example of an error handling function named errorLogger that handles the onErrorOccurred event.

segment.source: See Error Handling in JavaScript walkthrough for a walkthrough that demonstrates AdControl error handling in JavaScript.
segment.target: See Error Handling in JavaScript walkthrough for a walkthrough that demonstrates AdControl error handling in JavaScript.

segment.source: XAML apps
segment.target: XAML apps

segment.source: To handle AdControl errors in a XAML app:
segment.target: To handle AdControl errors in a XAML app:

segment.source: Assign the ErrorOccurred event to the name of an event handler delegate.
segment.target: Assign the ErrorOccurred event to the name of an event handler delegate.

segment.source: Code the error event handling delegate so that it takes two parameters: an Object for the sender and an AdErrorEventArgs object.
segment.target: Code the error event handling delegate so that it takes two parameters: an Object for the sender and an AdErrorEventArgs object.

segment.source: Here is an example that assigns a delegate named OnAdError to the ErrorOccurred event.
segment.target: Here is an example that assigns a delegate named OnAdError to the ErrorOccurred event.

segment.source: Here is an example definition of the OnAdError delegate that writes error information to the output window in Visual Studio.
segment.target: Here is an example definition of the OnAdError delegate that writes error information to the output window in Visual Studio.

segment.source: See Error handling in XAML/C# walkthrough for a walkthrough that demonstrates AdControl error handling in XAML and C#.
segment.target: See Error handling in XAML/C# walkthrough for a walkthrough that demonstrates AdControl error handling in XAML and C#.
